Name: Gunspell - Steam Edition
About the game: It is a story-driven rpg-adventure where guns and magic act together! Become a member of this powerful Order whose mission it is to protect Earth. Travel through other worlds, contend with monsters, upgrade your weapons and enhance your magic. Have fun! • Match 3 battles with a lot of features • Multiple strange new worlds to explore • Hordes of enemies to fight • Tons of different weapons, items, and spells! • Awesome graphics! Game Awards ★ DevGAMM Award ★ MS Windows Store Staff Pick
